Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Rare Undeveloped Site Along Boundary Rd

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is delighted to exclusively bring to market 472 Boundary Road, Derrimut, For Sale.

Site details:
+ Site area: 7,869sqm*
+ Block dimensions: 144.5m x 54.46m
+ Permits approved for lucrative 13 warehouse and cafe development
+ Terrific exposure for your business or development, tens of thousands of cars passing daily
+ One of the last undeveloped sites along Boundary Road, surrounded by national occupiers
+ Industrial 2 Zone, offering the widest range of permissible uses with the fewest restrictions

For further details, including the information memorandum with building plans, please contact the agents at CBRE.

*approx.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: CAPITALISE QUICKLY - OCCUPY WITH EXPOSURE OR DEVELOP TOMORROW WITH APPROVED PERMITS!

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE and Sisk Lawson Real Estate are pleased to exclusively bring to market a highly desirable combination of assets at 106 Australis Drive and 34 Grimes Court, Derrimut. 

Zoned Industrial 1, the properties sit only 600m* from Robinsons Road, and only 1km* to the freeway on/off ramp.

106 AUSTRALIS DRIVE, DERRIMUT
+ 10,020sqm*
+ Concept plan available on request
+ Titled and ready to be developed
+ Dual street access and drive through capability through Grimes Court and Australis Drive, Derrimut
+ Circa 90 metre* frontage across Australis Drive and approx 120 metre block depth

34 GRIMES COURT, DERRIMUT
+ 120sqm* office over two levels
+ 760sqm* of clear span warehouse
+ 555sqm* of secure yard
+ Freestanding building adjoining 106 Australis Drive
+ Container height roller shutter door
+ Full staff amenities
+ Ample off-street parking
+ Modern 2 level offices

Properties can be purchased together or individually.

This site offers many attributes such as terrific vehicle access expansion/re-development potential and is ready to be occupied immediately.

This opportunity will not last long.

For more information please do not hesitate to contact the appointed agents.

CBRE:
Ricardo Cappelletti: 0421 837 421
Fergus Pragnell: 0410 681 492

Sisk Lawson Real Estate:
Paul Lawson: 0413 127 679
Adrian Sisk: 0403 923 852

*approx.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: ULTIMATE LOW SITE COVERAGE FACILITY, DRIVE THROUGH CAPABILITY - BE QUICK

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to offer 90 Castro Way, Derrimut for sale.

- Total land area: 4.451Ha*
- Benched site ready to develop
- Serviced and titled
- Industrial 1 zoning

Located in the Paramount Industrial Estate, the site adjoins an 18 hole, par 72 championship golf course and is just off Mount Derrimut Road, providing ease of access to the Western Freeway & Western Ring Road.

The transportation advantages are coupled with the proximity of the site to local amenities including Derrimut Village and Deer Park Train Station. 

Paramount Industrial Estate is a sought after precinct of the western industrial market, validated by the calibre of neighbouring occupiers including AirRoad, Volkswagen, Linfox and Sleepmaker.

*approx.

CBRE is delighted to present for sale 38 Barclay Road, Derrimut 

Located in the esteemed Paramount Estate, this is a rare opportunity to purchase a well-proportioned lot.
  
+ Lot size: 2,530sqm* 
+ Dimensions: 31m* x 81m* 
+ Industrial 1 Zone 
+ Titled and ready for development 

For further details, please contact CBRE.

*approx.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: WELL PROPORTIONED BLOCK WITHIN THE PARAMOUNT ESTATE!
